about_the_game:
Experience the time-travel puzzle-platformer! A branching story with over eight hours of mind-melting puzzles awaits you. Learn to use time-portals to overcome challenges in ways you have never done before. Uncover the secrets of time-manipulation and take control of the world's fate.



Every problem can be solved with the manipulation of time. Harness these unique tools that are at your disposal for the first time ever! Just be careful to not break your brain. It was not designed for this.


This time-portal teleports you or anything that you throw into it an arbitrary amount of time into the future. Popular uses include: evading danger, awaiting the arrival of platforms or skipping the boring parts of life. This is the safest form of time-travel and is the recommended introduction to time-travel as a whole.

Hint: Throwing things that bother you into a Future Portal and letting your future-self deal with them is a great way to solve your problems.




This time-portal brings you or others into the past. Sounds simple right? Well... not quite so: Changing the past is very dangerous, because it can create time-paradoxes. However, that rarely happens... right?! Popular uses include: holding the door open for yourself, duplicating items or accidentally changing the entire history of the planet.

Hint: Temporadox Inc. does not take any liability in the case of the space time continuum's destruction.




Were you ever annoyed having to repeat large parts of a level or puzzle, because you made a small mistake? Are you tired of badly placed checkpoints or constantly having to quicksave? Not anymore! With the unlimited ability to rewind time you can undo any mistakes quickly, restoring your game to any point you were at before. Stopping and forwarding time is also possible but pales in comparison to being able to undo everything.



Ever played a game with a branching story and kept wondering where all those different choices lead? Not here! Due to your unlimited power to rewind time and a handy worldline-interface you can explore different story branches and hop from one to another seamlessly. Experiment with your choices! Some wrong decisions might be required to gain the necessary knowledge to proceed. Find your way through this maze of a story and become a true time-travel master.

But in the beginning you only have an enormous headache and a strange device in your hand. You try to remember how you got here but your mind is filled only with strange memories experiencing the same experiments over and over again. The voices of eccentric scientists and a fledgling A.I. rummage through your head. Were they allies or enemies? What did they want? It is time to take matters into your own hands and make sense of this mess.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Temporadox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Travel through time like never before! Use time-portals leading both to future and past to solve puzzles in this mind-bending platformer and finally find a way to escape the laboratory using time-rewind powers that let you switch between different timelines caused by your choices.
